page.title: 10ATTITUDES
page.content: Dawn Cotterill is a young resident of Chale Green.She gave us some of her views on the area. Her general view is that the area is very peaceful and quiet,in most places.The one thing that does spoil the area is the new housing estate that has been built there. Dawn used to live in Carisbrooke,but she prefers to live in Chale Green. She thinks that Chale Green area will not be the same in one hundred years,because the area is continually developing.Therefore she believes it will change for the worse.Fortunately Roud will not change very much because of the preservation order that has been issued on that area. She would not move even if Â£1000 was offered.She seemed to speak for the majority.
